value.name: service organisation
value.description: title:service organisationhead:Service organisationAll hospitals admitting people with suspected acute heart failure should provide a specialist heart failure team that is based on a cardiology ward and provides outreach services. Ensure that all people being admitted to hospital with suspected acute heart failure have early and continuing input from a dedicated specialist heart failure team.Quality standardsThe following quality statement is relevant to this part of the interactive flowchart.3Organisation of care – early specialist inputSourcesThe NICE guidance that was used to create this part of the interactive flowchart. CG187
